sentences.en: Anxiety comes from not being able to orient yourself in your own existence.
sentences.cn: 不能适应生活便会产生焦虑。

sentences.en: As a result it's important to use visual cues to orient users.
sentences.cn: 因此需要提供视觉上的提示来标识位置和方向,这很重要.

sentences.en: Because it can orient any maps to the direction I'm facing.
sentences.cn: 因为它能为地图程序做指向并根据行进方向旋转地图.

sentences.en: I haven't been able to orient my ideas to the new conditions.
sentences.cn: 我还未能使自己的观点适应新情况.

sentences.en: It is often economical to orient the flight lines in one direction rather than another.
sentences.cn: 把航线定向在某一方向上住住会比定向在另一方向上更加经济.

sentences.en: It takes new students a while to orientate themselves to college life.
sentences.cn: 新生要经过一段时间才能适应大学生活。

sentences.en: Overviews serve a similar purpose to signposts in an interface: They help to orient users.
sentences.cn: 界面总体视图起着与导航标志相同的作用,即帮助用户定位.

sentences.en: She lay still for a few seconds, trying to orient herself.
sentences.cn: 她静静地躺了一会儿，试图弄清自己的方位。

sentences.en: She looked at the street names, trying to orient herself.
sentences.cn: 她看看街名，试图确定自己的方位。

sentences.en: The climbers stopped to orient themselves before descending the mountain.
sentences.cn: 登山者先停下来确定所在的位置,然后再下山.

sentences.en: The dean of students tries to orient the freshmen.
sentences.cn: 训导主任努力帮助一年级新生适应环境.

sentences.en: The explorer climbed a tree in order to orient himself.
sentences.cn: 探险家爬上树以认清方向.

sentences.en: The Orient equitation club is mainly for its members who like riding.
sentences.cn: 骑术俱乐部以会员为主,聚集了各界的爱马人士,并对游园客人等开放.

sentences.en: These not only help in presentation but also help orient users.
sentences.cn: 这不仅有助于表达,而且可以帮助使用者在创建时更好地定位.

sentences.en: We must orient our products to the needs of the market.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使我们的产品适应市场的需要.

sentences.en: We must orient our work to the needs of the people.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使我们的工作面向人民的需要.

sentences.en: You can orient yourself by remembering that the hill is due north.
sentences.cn: 只要记住这座小山位于正北方,你就能确定你所在的方位了.

sentences.en: You will need the time to orient yourself to your new way of eating.
sentences.cn: 你需要时间适应新的吃法。

sentences.en: You will need the time to orient yourself to your new way of eating.
